subtitle: Hello merry christmas and happy new year to you all to those who are in a good place in their life
as well as those who are not in as beneficial situations my heart goes out to you all
and thank you to everyone who has subscribed, become a Patreon or left word of encouragement
on the channel i only started this channel earlier this year and i've been deeply humbled by all the
feedback and support, 2022 will be a very exciting year for this channel as well as the
books I'm going to publish so be sure to stay tuned ~ for this winter christmas holiday episode
I want to talk briefly about the significance of this time of the year and how we can use it
to move forward into the next year; more aligned with a reality that connects to
the greater reality; by greater reality i mean that i am pointing towards
experiencing or being blessed by the most purest dimensions in our consciousness
in creation even above the idea of god itself as Lao Tzu said: "The unnamable is the eternal reality,
naming is the origin of all particular things", so i'm talking about the origin the source
and unifying ourselves with that and to talk of this i also feel i'm almost talking blasphemy
right just like how Jesus was accused of speaking blasphemy and which is why he was put on the cross
you see the government at that time felt threatened that he spoke of such things
as if he were really a living god but he was and yet he also said to them: "Ye are Gods"
meaning that God was within them too, within all of us; that's a teaching from Jesus most churches
won't go into and it says in the original hebrew translation of the bible that Jesus said: "I am 'a'
son of God", he didn't say I am 'the' son of God such as in modern translations we as γιος του Θεού
in Greek means "a son of God" and also "son of" in Hebrew means "the nature of" so in other words
Jesus was saying he has "the nature of God", as does everyone else, similarly in the Bible it also says:
"Don't you know that you yourselves are god's temple and that god's spirit dwells in your midst?"
so christmas, or CHRIST-MASS" represents this cosmic event that can be performed within the hearts of
each of us; this event of surrender; surrender of ourselves to the greater cosmic intelligence that
lies within, to that consciousness that is all-pervasive of all things and through doing so
we no longer become a stranger in this universe, but instead we are deeply rooted and that's one
with it; but often at times we can't feel at one with it which is why this video is dedicated to
going through three very simple crucial rules in order to cleanse the heart of its... heaviness
these three rules are three major barriers that we all have and by transcending them we align and
root ourselves more deeply on this path towards the divine, this includes helping us to more
deeply comprehend the dimensions of reality too, such as the fifth dimension ~ the Astral
in fact as we open ourselves up within we open up lines of multidimensional
consciousness multidimensional communication in other words our intuition
where the intelligence of higher dimensions of consciousness can flow in, remember that dimensions
of consciousness or dimensions are not just locations or places here and there but they
are levels of consciousness that can be accessed when we are open but it's only accessed and it
only flows when we are free free from the three barriers which we'll look at here and there's no
better way to go into 2022 with these basic but often challenging principles so ~ Step one: forgive
others - think about your entire life now from the moment you were born and think of all the people
who have done you wrong all the people who have ever hurt you judged you said something cruel
did something violent perhaps someone did something that most people would consider
unforgivable think of all the people you hate spite or often feel negatively towards perhaps
someone left you said something behind your back betrayed you in some way now sense all of the
judgment fear hate and sadness that comes with it all and now see the attachment to the idea of
these people and experiences that exist within the consciousness of you as an individual see
these people in your mind's eye see a cord attached from your energy to their energy and now
say to them all mentally i forgive you allow yourself to fully embrace forgiveness forgive
all people all people don't discriminate don't judge all people as it says in the Lord's prayer:
"Forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us" ~ allow yourself to be freed
from these connections which bound you to lower worlds lower dreams lower states of consciousness
you should call upon your spiritual strength to sense the rigidity of your own
psychological and physiological responses to those you may have a harder time forgiving be aware
of the energy that you have placed on these ideas and reclaim them back send them light and then cut
the attachment to free yourself from old ties old patterns old reactions forgiveness frees the heart
do not wait for apologies do not try to rationalize why you should forgive simply let go
let go of regrets let go of burdens let go of the weight of hatred in your heart
and free your spirit the understanding of why you do it comes after you have truly let go
through sensing the inner peace and freedom that arises from doing so
at first you may think this only applies to really bad things that have happened but it also applies
to strangers that passes on the streets we may think and feel about certain people have little
judgments about people here and there perhaps someone bumped into us and we were in a bad mood
forgive all people so ~ Step number two: forgive yourself
after forgiving others the next step is also to forgive yourself
forgive those parts of yourself that allowed you to experience transgressions and suffering
in the first place sense any guilt or lack of self-worth and forgive yourself
sense any conflict deep within any voices that argue with you often
and say things like i can't do this i can't go on this is too hard i'm just not
good enough i've done too much harm in the past go into these voices with a fresh perspective
what is your relationship with yourself everyone makes mistakes
mistakes are some of the best lessons of all it's what deepens this experience of being
human so you have all the reason in the world to forgive yourself they say time is a great healer
but the choice to forgive is even more powerful forgive and be at peace within yourself
Step three: let go of personal history ~ in the same way you forgave other people
and let them go you can also let go of yourself do not wallow in the idea of your personal history
let go let go of your past self and the negative reactions from your past self
do not identify with your past the past is not you
they are memories illusions nothing more they do not exist in direct reality
if you have pain from your past great learn from it and then let it all go
if we believe that we are the ideas of the past then how can we move forward how can
there be space for our deeper self to manifest expansion of the heart cannot occur if the heart
carries a heavy burden of the past instead it only perpetuates more of the same and you might ask
what am i if i am not my past well why is there the compulsion to know in the first place
let go truly let go be comfortable with the idea that you and your future is an ineffable mystery
just as the universe is a great mystery so too are you and the sooner you accept that
the sooner you begin to understand the mystery at a core level not at an intellectual level
but at a core level of intelligence as the spiritual man that Einstein himself was once
said: "The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. Life is a mystery, not a problem
waiting to be solved." ~ by letting go of the past we tune into what is commonly called the higher self
or future self get in touch with this visualize intuit feel what your future self will be what
it is what it should be what you want it to be in your heart and sense the pull towards it start
informing yourself from the future you stop informing yourself from the past you take comfort
in the mystery of yourself don't desperately try to seek for labels and ideas to add to yourself
being lost is how we find ourselves sow the seeds now for what direction you'd like to move towards
so that one day down the line you will be more attracted to situations states of being
and realizations that are more aligned with who you are meant to be at your call the more
self-realized version of you liberate yourself from personal history memories are just ideas
thought forms in your consciousness which you can either choose to give life to or choose to be free
from the past should never condition or limit your future whether in this life or the next
whatever experience you've had up to now you are not that do not identify with that meditate on the
symbol of the crucifix since it is christmas die to your past so that you may be reborn anew die
to every moment so that the presence of fullness makes no room for the past and so as you see by
sending unconditional love and forgiveness towards those and ourselves who are in fear and darkness
especially to those who have done us wrong we also in the process free ourselves and give
us the opportunity to expand into deeper levels of awareness forgiveness is a tremendously high
form of magic which gives life to miracles in our experience forgiveness is so crucial
because it seemingly miraculously dissolves dreams attachments personal hallucinations of reality
that do not coincide with your future reality with your greater reality that's waiting for
you does the past ever progress no does the past ever change no can we change it no that is why
it is said that hell is the eternal suffering of the soul because as long as you are attached to it
to the pain of the past nothing will change it only perpetuates itself
until you choose to let it go not intellectually but in your heart in your core true freedom
is radical freedom meaning that we make a radical choice to be free in other words we don't
half-heartedly choose who we forgive or be fickle and choose when to forgive we become forgiving
beings at our core and we use this conviction like a flaming sword whenever we meet obstacles in our
past and every time we do our presence grows in love not mundane love but divine love where
harmony and beauty are much more common to be seen in our daily experience and of course goes and
flows deeply into our practices of spirituality and self-growth so if you want to continue this
sort of contemplation into a deeper meditation I'll be doing a guided meditation in a few days
which will guide you through doing these three steps in a visual way so that we can all continue
and progress into 2022 with more love compassion and expansion than we've ever experienced before
both as individuals and as a collective there is always infinite potential for greater awakening
every day in every moment this is something we all have to realize deeply and all paths all
spiritual paths slowly lead to this gradual constant growth of being deeply rooted
in our present moment and escaping the labyrinth of our noisy mind; the matrix of the mind...
so peace be with you all on this holiday everyone, assalamu alaikum, aleichem shalom
